Inception: Amazing visuals and a mind-bending storyline.
Leonardo DiCaprio gave a brilliant performance.
The movie is complex and confusing at times.
Interstellar: The pacing is slow in some parts.
Avengers: Too many characters with limited depth.
Visually impressive and fun to watch.
Titanic: The movie feels too long for some viewers.
Joker: Dark and realistic portrayal of society.
The movie is disturbing for some audiences.
